channel.title: Links on David Calhoun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Links on David Calhoun's blog

item.title: JavaScript links from last week (September 26)
item.description: JavaScript Asteroids - blow up any webpage with this bookmarklet! JS1k contest - and the winner PromoteJS - Google bombing with a good intent. Better links to JavaScript documentation! Async and defer attributes for Script tags added to WebKit Evercookie - uses devious ways to try to track users. Hmm, this one is questionable. Please use it for good, not evil… :/ JSPerf.com - not really new news, but a nice quick way to test algorithm performance in JavaScript
